title: Typonauten
content:
»Typonauten« is a collective of three designers in Bremen and Hamburg (Germany). They are also typedesigner of some headline fonts. They contribute on the [spatium](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224749/http:/typophile.com/wiki/spatium) magazine with some artworks and got some awards for their book designs.

More information: [http://www.typonauten.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224749/http:/www.typonauten.de/ "http://www.typonauten.de")
author: spatium
